about.description:
I'm a computer engineer and game developer currently based in Warsaw. I have a passion for building strange worlds and the sturdy code that supports them. Whether it's a reliable backend system or a game mechanic that lets you play as a destructive cat, I love the process of creation.

On the tech side, I build functional platforms like GamerLog (Django) and creative tools like Bitmapify. I even combined my love for sports and code to build an AI-powered NBA match predictor.

Creatively, I live in Unity and Unreal Engine. I've explored narrative horror in Echoes of Stella, arcade survival in Swarmbreaker, and pure chaos in In A Bad Mewd. I also collaborated on the high-speed sports game Killwats League.

With a degree in Computer Engineering, I'm now diving deeper into the industry through Game Programming at Futuregames. When Iâ€™m not debugging, you'll find me making music or jumping into random creative side quests.
